page.title: 03Traffic Count Gilden Way
page.content:
We counted traffic on{Gilden Way.}We did our counts at 8.30am, 12,30pm and 3.15pm. We found that most traffic was coming to{Harlow}from{Sheering.}We counted for 15 minutes, then we multiplied by 4 to give{vehicles per {hour.}Traffic going to{Harlow}is in blue.
8.30am 12.30pm 3.15pm {Ha} Sh {Ha} Sh {Ha} Sh
M/Bikes{32} 4{ 12} 4{ 8} 8 Bikes { 8} 4 { 28} 8 { 16} 4 Vans {80} 28 { 40} 36 { 28} 36 Lorries{24} 16 { 8} 20 { 16} 16 Cars {1276 }268{ 184} 216 { 476} 308 Other{ 12 }8 { 0} 8 { 8} 8
Total{1432} 328{ 272} 292 { 552} 380
